The answer is No. F0/2 is not a designated port on SW2 and F0/2 is not a Non-designated port on SW3 because root bridge only has designated port(destination port). In the given setup,SW1 is root bridge so F0/1,F0/2 are designated port on SW1.

6:52 Sir, how to configure trunk ? Please
did you made it out of uni bro
is it main part!
trunk port is the port which will forward the entire traffic

Commands to configure once you select trunk interface: step1: enable step2: configure terminal step3: interface <interface_name> step4: switchport mode trunk step5: switchport nonegotiate  If you got encapsulation error make sure encapsulation set to dot1q to set encapsulation to dot1q fllow the command after selecting interface:  step 1: switchport trunk encapsulation dot1q   once encapsulation follow the above commands to set interface to trunk.
